name: Slime Slinger (meerian)
description:
A simplistic fast-paced auto-shooter where you play as a blue slime. Defeat the enemy red slimes, collect their EXP and choose unique upgrades as you try to survive against the oncoming slime horde.

Features:

  • Fast-paced gameplay where each game lasts around 5 minutes.
  • Leveling system with over 10 upgrade options to choose from.
  • Scoring system based on time survived and enemies defeated.

Controls:
Move using arrow keys or WASD. 

Creator's Notes:
This is my first game I have created and I hope you enjoy playing it. Any feedback will be appreciated!
